card.name: 7 of Swords
card.meaning: Reversed, the 7 of Swords indicates imposter syndrome, self-deception, keeping secrets, and getting caught. You may be struggling with feelings of inadequacy or the fear of being exposed. This card suggests the need to confront any dishonesty or deception in your life, whether it's coming from within or from external sources. It's a reminder that true authenticity comes from being honest with yourself and others. Focus on self-reflection and seek support from trusted individuals if needed. Embrace the transformative energy of this card, and allow yourself to break free from any self-imposed limitations.
